alert.note: Alert for Butte; Lawrence; Meade (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 8:39PM MDT until June 11 at 9:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BUTTE...WEST CENTRAL MEADE AND NORTH CENTRAL LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 839 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Nisland, or 14 miles east of Belle Fourche, moving east at 50 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR BELLE FOURCHE RESERVOIR, FRUITDALE, NISLAND, AND VALE. HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Newell around 845 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Vale and Owl Butte. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing destructive winds and large damaging hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
